mapper.select: SELECT mc.*, c.*, ADD_MONTHS(mc.coupon_regdate, 1) coupon_enddate FROM member_coupon mc JOIN coupon_db c ON mc.coupon_num = c.coupon_num WHERE mc.mem_num = #{mem_num}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_board WHERE mem_num=#{mem_num}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_comment WHERE mem_num=#{mem_num}

SELECT cc.*, fav_data.fav_cnt, cb.cb_type, cb.cb_title FROM community_comment cc LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS fav_cnt, cc_num FROM community_comment_fav GROUP BY cc_num) fav_data ON cc.cc_num = fav_data.cc_num JOIN community_board cb ON cc.cb_num = cb.cb_num WHERE cc.mem_num=#{mem_num}
